question: Who has been appointed as the chief executive of Indian Bank's Association (IBA)?
explanation:
As per the recent announcement from the Indian Bank\'s Association (IBA), Former Managing Director and CEO of Punjab National Bank, Sunil Mehta has taken charge as the Chief Executive of IBA. 
Sunil Mehta has recently retired as the MD and CEO of Punjab National Bank. He has previously held the post of Chairman of Indian Banks Association, which was replaced by the head of State Bank of India, Rajnish Kumar in October 2019. Now, Sunil Mehta has replaced VG Kannan, who assumed office on December 31, 2019.
